summary: This is an email chain from July 9, 2019, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, forwarding the name and contact information of an individual who called claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The email is intended to add this person to an FBI spreadsheet for follow-up.

persons.name: Byrne
persons.context: The sender of the main email, forwarding contact information for a potential witness about Epstein to FBI agents.

events.title: Potential Witness Contact
events.description: An individual called the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The contact details were forwarded to the FBI to be added to a spreadsheet for follow-up.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: On July 9, 2019, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York received a call from an individual claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The contact information for this potential witness was forwarded to the FBI to be added to a dedicated spreadsheet for follow-up.
The email indicates an active witness outreach and information-gathering process was ongoing in the Epstein investigation at that time.
